import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Button, Col, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import Message from "../../components/message/Message" import Loader from "../../components/loader/Loader" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import "./createProduct.scss" import { createNewProduct } from "../../redux/product/productAction" const CreateProduct = ({ history }) => { const createdProduct = useSelector((state) => state.productReducer) const dispatch = useDispatch() const {createdProductId , loading} = createdProduct useEffect(() => { console.log(createdProduct , createdProductId ); if ( createdProductId ) { history.push(`/product/${createdProductId}`) } }, [createdProductId , dispatch]) const [productInfo, changeProductInfo] = useState({ name: "", price: "", image: "", brand: "", description: "", countInStock: "", category: "", }) const { name, price, image, brand, description, countInStock, category, } = productInfo const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch( createNewProduct({ name, price, image, brand, description, countInStock, category, }) ) history.push(`/product/`) } const productInfoOnChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target changeProductInfo((preval) => { return { ...preval, [name]: value, } }) } return (
{loading && }

create new product

Name price image brand description category count In Stuck
) } export default CreateProduct
